recipesJson.name: Tropical citrus creamy cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Tootall
recipesJson.description: I was looking for a use of my flavors tropical citrus and I did it!!! This is a good tropical citrus cheesecake if there is such a thing. It has a distinguishable  cheesecake flavor. I was just playing around and it turned out really good I will definitely  be making this recipe again.
